snippet.title: Paralives - Creating and Editing Lots
snippet.description:
In Paralives, you can use simple but powerful tools to create and edit lots. Players will be able to create custom shapes for lots, expand their existing lot if they run out of space and even use the curve tool to create curved lot shapes!

You may have noticed the new measuring tape feature that allows you to easily draw lines of a specific length. This tool is now also available when placing walls and fences!

Join the Discord community to chat and get more info about Paralives:
https://Discord.gg/paralives

Support the game developer on Patreon:
https://Patreon.com/alexmasse
